about_the_game:
◆ Featured System


◇ Switch on full CG mode in the environment settings--browse HCGs freely
◇ Stress-free operation design--fast text skipping system

◆ Game Features


◇ Domination and submission, relationship of pleasure and abuse, slave's perspective
◇BDSM, Master-Slave, sadomasochism, ambiguity, emotional subtlety

◆ Story


--As long as he can be happy.
Understanding that he could not bring about the salvation of his first love, the man let go of his beloved himself.
The protagonist of the story was Kat, who chose to turn around and hide in the darkness of the night.

Li Yan, a man who had always always been treated as a dog, was kept as a pet by different rich and powerful people.
He was a slave with no loyalty, yet he longed to belong to someone.
They had been stuck in their past until they met each other.

--I don't need your pity or your love.
--I am a prisoner of desire, a humble and insignificant being, prostrate before you.
--Your world is wide and vast, but in my world...there will only be you.
--With that one look, I fell into an endless abyss.

The second round of the mutually redempting, heart-wrenching BL SM game "Sub for You"--"Until the Abyss"!
The most heartbreaking and stoic male partner in the first part is also getting his own chapter.

For the rest of their lives, they only wanted to be each other's prisoners.

◆ Gameplay Instructions


The game is played from a first-person perspective, with the player taking on the role of Li Yan, and gradually developing the relationship between Li Yan and Kat through the choices in the text.
